scripts.check_tor: curl --socks5 localhost:9050 --socks5-hostname localhost:9050 -s https://check.torproject.org/ | cat | grep -m 1 Congratulations | xargs
scripts.check_ip: curl ifconfig.co && curl http://ifconfig.co/country && curl http://ifconfig.co/city
scripts.check_tor_ip: torsocks wget -qO - https://api.ipify.org | awk '{cmd="curl https://ipapi.co/" $1 "/json"}; system(cmd)'
